short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Awards all goals, assists, and bylines to Harry Kane on the Premier League, BBC Sport, Guardian, and Sky Sports websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ensures that Harry Kane gets the recognition he deserves as England's leading goalscorer and sports journalist.

Hover over Harry Kanes to find the original author/scorer.

Satire, not meant to offend or cause abuse. This extension is provided as is without any warranty or support. Modifying the content of a website may be against its Terms of Use (this is something most ad blockers do however).
